p: Concepts presented here such as the EAS, allostasis, and dyshomeostasis can account for the age-relatedness of COVID-19 mortality and the multi-organ involvement in the disease. These concepts lead to testable hypotheses about biomarkers of risk in COVID-19 and about possible treatments. Ideas are cheap and easy; data are expensive and hard, and the science of COVID-19 and the autonomic nervous system is in its infancy.
